mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, title, id, viewCount, reservedDate FROM reserve WHERE num=#{num} AND id=#{id} ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (num, id, title, reservedDate, reservedTime) VALUES(#{num}, #{id}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{reservedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num, title, r.id, viewCount, reservedDate, reservedTime, name, phoneNumber FROM reserve r INNER JOIN petUsers p ON r.id = p.id) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
